speaker: Customer
text: You have reached out to a voicemail. Please leave a message at the tone.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. I'm trying to reach you regarding your overdue account.

speaker: Customer
text: To leave your message, press one.

speaker: Agent
text: Please call us back at your earliest convenience, you can reach me at one-eight-hundred-six-five-five-seven-two-three-four.
